'''Sedarik''' was the legendary founder of the [[palan-teen]], the devolved inhabitants of the [[Garden of the Cursed]] in the [[Tomb of Martek]]. He was said to have brought his people into that "World Above" in order to keep the [[guilder]]s from committing evils.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|108}}
